quotes.quote: Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to make others believe they are the cause of it.
quotes.author: Al Batt

quotes.quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The happiness of a man in this life does not consist in the absence but in the mastery of his passions.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: A person is never happy except at the price of some ignorance.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Happiness arises in a state of peace, not of tumult.
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: The discovery of a new dish does more for human happiness than the discovery of a new star.
quotes.author: Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of one's values.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Content makes poor men rich; discontentment makes rich men poor.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If there were in the world today any large number of people who desired their own happiness more than they desired the unhappiness of others, we could have paradise in a few years.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: All I can say about life is, Oh God, enjoy it!
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.quote: The pursuit of happiness is a most ridiculous phrase; if you pursue happiness you'll never find it.
quotes.author: C. P. Snow

quotes.quote: Cherish all your happy moments: they make a fine cushion for old age.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: This is the best kind of voyeurism, hearing joy from your neighbors.
quotes.author: Chuck Sigars

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's hard to avoid the happiness of others.
quotes.author: David Assael

quotes.quote: He wanted to live life in such a way that if a photograph were taken at random it would be a cool photograph. Things should look right. Fun; there should be a lot of fun and no more sadness than absolutely necessary.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: All sanity depends on this: that it should be a delight to feel heat strike the skin, a delight to stand upright, knowing the bones are moving easily under the flesh.
quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

quotes.quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast - you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A lifetime of happiness! No man alive could bear it: it would be hell on earth.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: To be stupid, selfish, and have good health are three requirements for happiness, though if stupidity is lacking, all is lost.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Many persons have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness. It is not attained through self-gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Man is the artificer of his own happiness.
quotes.author: Immanuel Hermann Fichte

quotes.quote: If we cannot live so as to be happy, let us least live so as to deserve it.
quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

quotes.quote: I am a kind of paranoiac in reverse. I suspect people of plotting to make me happy.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Personal happiness lies in knowing that life is not a checklist of acquisition or achievement. Your qualifications are not your life.
quotes.author: James Oppenheim

quotes.quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance, the wise grows it under his feet.
quotes.author: Jean Houston

quotes.quote: At the height of laughter, the universe is flung into a kaleidoscope of new possibilities.
